property.name: new_user
property.value: insert into stats_user(date_dimension_id,platform_dimension_id,new_install_users,created)values(?,?,?,?) on duplicate key update new_install_users = ?

property.name: browser_new_user
property.value: insert into stats_device_browser(date_dimension_id,platform_dimension_id,browser_dimension_id,new_install_users,created)values(?,?,?,?,?) on duplicate key update new_install_users = ?

property.name: total_user_new_update_user
property.value: insert into `stats_user`( `date_dimension_id`, `platform_dimension_id`, `total_install_users`, `created` ) values(?,?,?,?) on duplicate key update `total_install_users` = ?

property.name: active_user
property.value: insert into `stats_user`( `date_dimension_id`, `platform_dimension_id`, `active_users`, `created` ) values(?,?,?,?) on duplicate key update `active_users` = ?

property.name: total_user_active_user
property.value: insert into `stats_user`( `date_dimension_id`, `platform_dimension_id`, `active_users`, `created` ) values(?,?,?,?) on duplicate key update `active_users` = ?

property.name: member_user
property.value: insert into `stats_user`( `date_dimension_id`, `platform_dimension_id`, `active_members`, `created` ) values(?,?,?,?) on duplicate key update `active_members` = ?

property.name: new_member
property.value: insert into `stats_user`( `date_dimension_id`, `platform_dimension_id`, `new_members`, `created` ) values(?,?,?,?) on duplicate key update `new_members` = ?

property.name: member_info
property.value: insert into `member_info`( `member_id`, `last_visit_date`, `member_id_server_date`, `created` ) values(?,?,?,?) on duplicate key update `last_visit_date` = ?

property.name: total_user_new_update_member
property.value: insert into `stats_user`( `date_dimension_id`, `platform_dimension_id`, `total_members`, `created` ) values(?,?,?,?) on duplicate key update `total_members` = ?

property.name: sessions
property.value: insert into `stats_user`( `date_dimension_id`, `platform_dimension_id`, `sessions`, `sessions_length`, `created` ) values(?,?,?,?,?) on duplicate key update `sessions` = ? , `sessions_length` = ?

property.name: page_view
